attacks.name: Fire Dance
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flame Kick
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to Blaziken. This attack does 80 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
